definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[מַן]] (so Gi, with most MSS., supported by Syr. man, Ar. manomno; v. K:§ 22, 1), [[מָן]] (Baer: v. on Da 3:6),

definitions.title: interr. pron.
definitions.body: who ? (OAram. Nab. Palm. [[מן]] Lzb:312 Cooke:188), Targum [[מן]], Syr. manman, Eth. manu:manu: Ar. manomano W:CG 123: BH [[מִי]]);—

who? Ezr 5:3, Ezr 5:9; strengthened by [[הוּא]], Da 3:15 [[וּמַן־הוּא אֱלָהּ דִּי]] who is the God who . . . ? (cf. Syr. manuwmanuw contr. from man huwman huw, and [[מַנּוּ]] in the Syriacizing Targum to Pr: also BH [[מִי הוּא]], [[הוּא]]

definitions.title: 4 b
definitions.body: b); so in the pl. Ezr 5:4 [[מִן־אִנוּן שְׁמָהָת]] what (lit. who: cf. [[מִי]]

definitions.title: 1 a
definitions.body: , and Ge 32:28, Ex 3:13 Targum) are the names of . . .?
[[מַן־דּי]] whosoever (lit. who is there that . . .? v. BH [[מִי]]

definitions.title: g
definitions.body: ) Da 3:6, Da 3:11 [[מִן־דִּי לָא יִפֵּל]], Da 4:14 [[וּלְמִן דִּי יִחְבֵּא יִתְּנִנַּהּ]] to whomsoever he willeth, he giveth it, v:Da 4:22, v:Da 4:29, Da 5:21 (so Nab. [[מן די]], Cooke:241, 325 ff.; Targum [[מַן דְּ]]; Syr. manman; cf. Eg. Aram. S-C:Pap. K 7, 12 [[ולמן זי חבית תנתן]]).
